verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H6953>Preacher,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%>
What does <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3504>gain<s%> from all his <S%H5999>labor<s%> in which he <S%H5998>labors<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun?<s%>
The <S%H8121>sun<s%> also <S%H2224>rises,<s%> and the <S%H8121>sun<s%> goes <S%H935>down,<s%> and <S%H7602>hurries<s%> to its <S%H4725>place<s%> where it <S%H2224>rises.<s%>

The <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H1980>goes<s%> toward the <S%H1864>south,<s%> and turns <S%H5437>around<s%> to the <S%H6828>north.<s%> It turns <S%H5437>around<s%> <S%H1980>continually<s%> as it <S%H7307>goes,<s%> and the wind returns again to its <S%H7725>courses.<s%>

All the <S%H5158>rivers<s%> <S%H1980>run<s%> into the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> yet the <S%H3220>sea<s%> is not <S%H4392>full.<s%> To the <S%H4725>place<s%> where the <S%H5158>rivers<s%> <S%H1980>flow,<s%> there they <S%H7725>flow<s%> <S%H3212>again.<s%>

All <S%H1697>things<s%> are full of <S%H3023>weariness<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H3201>beyond<s%> <S%H1696>uttering.<s%> The <S%H5869>eye<s%> is not <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H7200>seeing,<s%> nor the <S%H241>ear<s%> <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H8085>hearing.<s%>
That which has been is that which shall <S%H6213>be;<s%> and that which has been done is that which shall be <S%H6213>done:<s%> and there is no <S%H2319>new<s%> thing under the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

Is <S%H3426>there<s%> a <S%H1697>thing<s%> of which it may be <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7200>"Behold,<s%> this is <S%H2319>new?<s%>" It has been long <S%H3528>ago,<s%> in the <S%H5769>ages<s%> which were before <S%H6440>us.<s%>
There is no <S%H2146>memory<s%> of the <S%H7223>former;<s%> neither shall there be any <S%H2146>memory<s%> of the latter that are to <S%H314>come,<s%> among those that shall come <S%H314>after.<s%>

I <S%H5414>applied<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H1875>seek<s%> and to search <S%H8446>out<s%> by <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> concerning all that is <S%H6213>done<s%> under the <S%H8064>sky.<s%> It is a <S%H7451>heavy<s%> <S%H6045>burden<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> to be afflicted <S%H6031>with.<s%>
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> all the <S%H4639>works<s%> that are <S%H6213>done<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun;<s%> and <S%H1892>behold,<s%> all is vanity and a <S%H7469>chasing<s%> after <S%H7307>wind.<s%>
That which is <S%H5791>crooked<s%> <S%H3201>can't<s%> be made <S%H8626>straight;<s%> and that which is <S%H2642>lacking<s%> <S%H3201>can't<s%> be <S%H4487>counted.<s%>

I <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H3820>myself,<s%> <S%H559>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H3254>obtained<s%> for myself <S%H1431>great<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> above all who were <S%H6440>before<s%> me in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> <S%H3820>Yes,<s%> my heart has had <S%H7235>great<s%> <S%H7200>experience<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>"

I <S%H5414>applied<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H1947>madness<s%> and <S%H5531>folly.<s%> I <S%H3045>perceived<s%> that <S%H1571>this<s%> also was a <S%H7475>chasing<s%> after <S%H7307>wind.<s%>
For in <S%H7230>much<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is <S%H7230>much<s%> <S%H3708>grief;<s%> and he who <S%H3254>increases<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> <S%H3254>increases<s%> <S%H4341>sorrow.<s%>
